description:
This dataset contains Global Ecosystem Dynamics Investigation (GEDI)
Level 4A (L4A) Version 2 predictions of the aboveground biomass
density (AGBD; in Mg/ha) and estimates of the prediction standard
error within each sampled geolocated laser footprint. In this version,
the granules are in sub-orbits.
Height metrics from simulated waveforms associated with field estimates
of AGBD from multiple regions and plant functional types (PFTs) were
compiled to generate a calibration dataset for models representing
the combinations of world regions and PFTs (i.e., deciduous broadleaf
trees, evergreen broadleaf trees, evergreen needleleaf trees, deciduous
needleleaf trees, and the combination of grasslands, shrubs, and
woodlands).The algorithm setting group selection
used for GEDI02_A Version 2 has been modified for evergreen broadleaf
trees in South America to reduce false positive errors resulting from
the selection of waveform modes above ground elevation as the lowest mode.
The dataset LARSE/GEDI/GEDI04_A_002_MONTHLY is a raster version
of the original GEDI04_A product. The raster images are organized as monthly
composites of individual orbits in the corresponding month.

See [User Guide](https://daac.ornl.gov/GEDI/guides/GEDI_L4A_AGB_Density_V2_1.html)
for more information.

The Global Ecosystem Dynamics Investigation [GEDI](https://gedi.umd.edu/)
mission aims to characterize ecosystem structure and dynamics to enable
radically improved quantification and understanding of the Earth's carbon cycle
and biodiversity. The GEDI instrument, attached to the International Space
Station (ISS), collects data globally between 51.6° N and 51.6° S
latitudes at the highest resolution and densest sampling of the
3-dimensional structure of the Earth. The GEDI instrument consists of three
lasers producing a total of eight beam ground transects, which instantaneously
sample eight ~25 m footprints spaced approximately every 60 m along-track.

Product                 | Description
:---------------------  | :----------------------------------------------
L2A Vector         | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI02_A_002](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI02_A_002)
L2A Monthly raster | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI02_A_002_MONTHLY](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI02_A_002_MONTHLY)
L2A table index    | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI02_A_002_INDEX](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI02_A_002_INDEX)
L2B Vector         | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI02_B_002](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI02_B_002)
L2B Monthly raster | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI02_B_002_MONTHLY](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI02_B_002_MONTHLY)
L2B table index    | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI02_B_002_INDEX](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI02_B_002_INDEX)
L4A Biomass Vector | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI04_A_002](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI04_A_002)
L4A Monthly raster | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI04_A_002_MONTHLY](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI04_A_002_MONTHLY)
L4A table index    | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI04_A_002_INDEX](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI04_A_002_INDEX)
L4B Biomass        | [LARSE/GEDI/GEDI04_B_002](LARSE_GEDI_GEDI04_B_002)
gee:terms_of_use:
This dataset is in the public domain and is available
without restriction on use and distribution. See [NASA's
Earth Science Data & Information Policy]
(https://science.nasa.gov/earth-science/earth-science-data/data-information-policy)
for additional information.

links.title: Run the example for LARSE/GEDI/GEDI04_A_002_MONTHLY in the Earth Engine Code Editor

providers.name: Rasterization: Google and USFS Laboratory for Applications of Remote Sensing in Ecology (LARSE)
NASA GEDI mission, accessed through the USGS LP DAAC

eo:bands.description: Predicted aboveground biomass density
eo:bands.name: agbd

eo:bands.description: Lower prediction interval (see "alpha" attribute for the level)
eo:bands.name: agbd_pi_lower

eo:bands.description: Upper prediction interval (see "alpha" attribute for the level)
eo:bands.name: agbd_pi_upper

eo:bands.description: Aboveground biomass density prediction standard error
eo:bands.name: agbd_se

eo:bands.description: Model prediction in fit units
eo:bands.name: agbd_t

eo:bands.description:
The L4A algorithm is run if this flag is set to 1. This flag selects
data that have sufficient waveform fidelity for AGBD estimation.
eo:bands.name: agbd_t_se

eo:bands.description: Aboveground biomass density prediction standard error
eo:bands.name: algorithm_run_flag

eo:bands.description: Beam identifier
eo:bands.name: beam

eo:bands.description: Channel identifier
eo:bands.name: channel

eo:bands.description:
Flag indicating degraded state of pointing and/or positioning
information
eo:bands.name: degrade_flag

eo:bands.description: Time since Jan 1 00:00 2018
eo:bands.name: delta_time

eo:bands.description: Elevation of center of lowest mode relative to reference ellipsoid
eo:bands.name: elev_lowestmode

eo:bands.description: Flag identifying the most useful L2 data for biomass predictions
eo:bands.name: l2_quality_flag

eo:bands.description: Flag simplifying selection of most useful biomass predictions
eo:bands.name: l4_quality_flag

eo:bands.description: Latitude of center of lowest mode
eo:bands.name: lat_lowestmode

eo:bands.description: Longitude of center of lowest mode
eo:bands.name: lon_lowestmode

eo:bands.description:
Master time, fractional part. master_int+master_frac is equivalent
to /BEAMXXXX/delta_time
eo:bands.name: master_frac

eo:bands.description:
Master time, integer part. Seconds since master_time_epoch.
master_int+master_frac is equivalent to /BEAMXXXX/delta_time',
eo:bands.name: master_int

eo:bands.description:
Prediction stratum identifier. Character ID of the prediction stratum
name for the 1 km cell
eo:bands.name: predict_stratum

eo:bands.description:
Predictor value is outside the bounds of the training data
(0=in bounds; 1=lower bound; 2=upper bound)
eo:bands.name: predictor_limit_flag

eo:bands.description:
Prediction value is outside the bounds of the training data
(0=in bounds; 1=lower bound; 2=upper bound)
eo:bands.name: response_limit_flag

eo:bands.description: Selected algorithm setting group
eo:bands.name: selected_algorithm

eo:bands.description: ID of mode selected as lowest non-noise mode
eo:bands.name: selected_mode

eo:bands.description: Flag indicating status of selected_mode
eo:bands.name: selected_mode_flag

eo:bands.description:
Beam sensitivity. Maximum canopy cover that can be penetrated
considering the SNR of the waveform
eo:bands.name: sensitivity

eo:bands.description: Solar elevation angle
eo:bands.name: solar_elevation

eo:bands.description:
Indicates elev_lowestmode is within 300m of Digital Elevation
Model (DEM) or Mean Sea Surface (MSS) elevation
eo:bands.name: surface_flag

eo:bands.description:
Shot number, a unique identifier.
This field has the format of OOOOOBBRRGNNNNNNNN, where:

* OOOOO: Orbit number
* BB: Beam number
* RR: Reserved for future use
* G: Sub-orbit granule number
* NNNNNNNN: Shot index
eo:bands.name: shot_number

eo:bands.description: Shot number within beam
eo:bands.name: shot_number_within_beam

eo:bands.description: Above ground biomass density; Geolocation latitude lowestmode
eo:bands.name: agbd_aN

eo:bands.description: Above ground biomass density lower prediction interval
eo:bands.name: agbd_pi_lower_aN

eo:bands.description: Above ground biomass density upper prediction interval
eo:bands.name: agbd_pi_upper_aN

eo:bands.description: Aboveground biomass density prediction standard error
eo:bands.name: agbd_se_aN

eo:bands.description: Aboveground biomass density model prediction in transform space
eo:bands.name: agbd_t_aN

eo:bands.description: Lower prediction interval in transform space
eo:bands.name: agbd_t_pi_lower_aN

eo:bands.description: Upper prediction interval in transform space
eo:bands.name: agbd_t_pi_upper_aN

eo:bands.description: Model prediction standard error in fit units
eo:bands.name: agbd_t_se_aN

eo:bands.description:
Algorithm run flag-this algorithm is run if this flag is set to 1.
This flag selects data that have sufficient waveform fidelity for
AGBD estimation
eo:bands.name: algorithm_run_flag_aN

eo:bands.description: Flag identifying the most useful L2 data for biomass predictions'
eo:bands.name: l2_quality_flag_aN

eo:bands.description: Flag simplifying selection of most useful biomass predictions
eo:bands.name: l4_quality_flag_aN

eo:bands.description: Predictor value is outside the bounds of the training data
eo:bands.name: predictor_limit_flag_aN

eo:bands.description: Prediction value is outside the bounds of the training data
eo:bands.name: response_limit_flag_aN

eo:bands.description: ID of mode selected as lowest non-noise mode
eo:bands.name: selected_mode_aN

eo:bands.description: Flag indicating status of selected mode
eo:bands.name: selected_mode_flag_aN

eo:bands.description: Elevation of center of lowest mode relative to the reference ellipsoid
eo:bands.name: elev_lowestmode_aN

eo:bands.description: Latitude of center of lowest mode
eo:bands.name: lat_lowestmode_aN

eo:bands.description: Longitude of center of lowest mode
eo:bands.name: lon_lowestmode_aN

eo:bands.description:
Maximum canopy cover that can be penetrated considering the SNR of
the waveform
eo:bands.name: sensitivity_aN

eo:bands.description:
Flag from digitizer indicating the real-time pulse detection algorithm
did not detect a return signal above its detection threshold within
the entire 10 km search window. The pulse location of the previous
shot was used to select the telemetered waveform.
eo:bands.name: stale_return_flag

eo:bands.description:
Tree cover in the year 2010, defined as canopy closure for all
vegetation taller than 5 m in height (Hansen et al., 2013) and
encoded as a percentage per output grid cell.
eo:bands.name: landsat_treecover

eo:bands.description:
The percent UMD GLAD Landsat observations with classified surface water
between 2018 and 2019. Values >80 usually represent permanent water
while values <10 represent permanent land.
eo:bands.name: landsat_water_persistence

eo:bands.description:
GEDI 1 km EASE 2.0 grid leaf-off start day-of-year derived from the
NPP VIIRS Global Land Surface Phenology Product.
eo:bands.name: leaf_off_doy

eo:bands.description:
GEDI 1 km EASE 2.0 grid flag derived from leaf_off_doy, leaf_on_doy,
and pft_class, indicating if the observation was recorded during
leaf-off conditions in deciduous needleleaf or broadleaf forests and
woodlands. 1=leaf-off, 0=leaf-on.
eo:bands.name: leaf_off_flag

eo:bands.description:
Flag that indicates the vegetation growing cycle for leaf-on
observations. Values are 0=leaf-off conditions, 1=cycle 1, 2=cycle 2.
eo:bands.name: leaf_on_cycle

eo:bands.description:
GEDI 1 km EASE 2.0 grid leaf-on start day- of-year derived from the
NPP VIIRS Global Land Surface Phenology product.
eo:bands.name: leaf_on_doy

eo:bands.description:
GEDI 1 km EASE 2.0 grid Plant Functional Type (PFT) derived from the
MODIS MCD12Q1v006 product. Values follow the Land Cover Type 5
Classification scheme.
eo:bands.name: pft_class

eo:bands.description:
GEDI 1 km EASE 2.0 grid world continental regions (0=Water, 1=Europe,
2=North Asia, 3=Australasia, 4=Africa, 5=South Asia, 6=South America,
7=North America).
eo:bands.name: region_class

eo:bands.description:
The focal window size used to calculate urban_proportion.
Values are 3 (3x3 pixel window size) or 5 (5x5 pixel window size).
eo:bands.name: urban_focal_window_size

eo:bands.description:
The percentage proportion of land area within a focal area surrounding
each shot that is urban land cover. Urban land cover was derived from
the DLR 12 m resolution TanDEM-X Global Urban Footprint Product.
eo:bands.name: urban_proportion

title: GEDI L4A Raster Aboveground Biomass Density, Version 2.1
